body_html:
LGTM, but I'd like @yifeif or @gunan to sign off on the build system changes, so not approving.

Also given that we had build errors it would be nice if the tests would complete. I don't know how to kick off another set of tests, though. Or maybe that happens automatically?

body:
LGTM, but I'd like @yifeif or @gunan to sign off on the build system changes, so not approving.

Also given that we had build errors it would be nice if the tests would complete.  I don't know how to kick off another set of tests, though.  Or maybe that happens automatically?
